participant_1.name: Alex Morgan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and determined, I thrive on competition and enjoy meeting new people.
participant_1.background: my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house.

participant_2.name: Jordan Lee
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and disciplined, I find joy in helping others and value teamwork.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i'm ex military. i work fulltime in a shipyard.
